授業目的: This course is designed to introduce students to the main tools of game theory and to some of their economic applications, especially focusing on static situations.
到達目標: To learn an elementary knowledge of game theory and apply it to a real-world issue.

第1回: Read Chapter 1 of Dutta (1999), especially focusing on 1.1 and 1.3.
第3回: Review of Problem Set 1 and Chapter 3 of Dutta (1999)
第5回: Review of Problem Set 2 and Chapter 4 of Dutta (1999)
Read Chapter 4 of Dutta (1999), focusing on 4.1, 4.2 and 4.4 (you can skip 4.3).
第6回: Read Chapter 4 of Dutta (1999), focusing on 4.1, 4.2 and 4.4 (you can skip 4.3).
第7回: Review of Problem Set 3 and Chapter 5 of Dutta (1999)
Read Chapter 5 of Dutta (1999), focusing on 5.1, 5.2 and 5.3 (you can skip 5.4).
第8回: Read Chapter 5 of Dutta (1999), focusing on 5.1, 5.2 and 5.3 (you can skip 5.4).
第9回: Review of Problem Set 4 and Chapter 6 of Dutta (1999)
Read Chapter 6 of Dutta (1999), focusing on 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, 6.4 and 6.5 (you can skip 6.6, 6.7 and 6.8).
第10回: Read Chapter 6 of Dutta (1999), focusing on 6.1, 6.2, 6.3, 6.4 and 6.5 (you can skip 6.6, 6.7 and 6.8) and move over to Chapter 8 of Dutta (1999)
第12回: Review of Problem Set 5 and Chapter 8 of Dutta (1999)
第13回: Review the entire materials for the final exam.
トピック.授業外学習2: The main mathematical prerequisite is single-variable calculus.  The rudiments of probability and analysis are introduced as needed.
